attributes.action: To scrap the Council tax in its present form.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present Council tax is a burden on the less well off in our society. this is certainly going to be an issue in a forthcoming general election,and could be a winner for the political party that promises a fairer method of taxation. Possible By removing items such as Education and Police, these to be paid for from general Taxation and so relieve householders from this unfair tax
